Technical Project Manager

Posted: 2025-10-11

Expires: 2025-10-25

Active
Position: Technical Project Manager Location: On-site – Gulberg Greens, Islamabad Timings: Full-time About the Role Centrox AI is seeking a Technical Project Manager with 2–4 years of experience in software development and project management. The ideal candidate will combine hands-on technical expertise (preferably full-stack) with strong leadership and delivery management skills to drive projects from concept to completion in an Agile environment. Key Responsibilities -Plan, execute, and deliver software projects on time and within scope using Agile/Scrum methodologies. -Define project scope, timelines, and deliverables aligned with business and technical goals. -Lead cross-functional teams of engineers, designers, and QA to ensure quality and efficiency. -Use project management tools (Jira, ClickUp, Asana, or Azure DevOps) to track progress, manage risks, and maintain documentation. -Leverage technical background to support architecture decisions and translate complex topics for stakeholders. -Communicate effectively with clients, manage expectations, lead demos, handle escalations, and prevent scope creep. -Monitor budget burn, resource allocation, and profitability while ensuring continuous improvement in delivery. Requirements -2–4 years of relevant experience in technical or IT project management. -Prior development experience — full-stack preferred (e.g., Node.js, React, Python). -Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or IT. -Strong understanding of SDLC, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment workflows. -Excellent organizational, leadership, and client communication skills. -Experience managing multiple projects and teams in a fast-paced environment. Preferred Skills -Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and DevOps practices. -Knowledge of QA processes and automation workflows. -Agile or PMP certification (a plus). Why Join Us This is a full-time, on-site role with strong growth potential in a collaborative environment. You’ll lead meaningful projects, work closely with skilled technical teams, and play a key role in shaping delivery excellence. Apply: team@centrox.io
📍 Islamabad#Technical Project Manager🧳 Experienced Required

Boxing Channel Script Writer

Posted: 2025-10-11

Expires: 2025-10-25

Active
🥊 Boxing Channel Script Writer (Research-Based) 📍 Unity Films – Rawalpindi 💻 Work From Home | Flexible Working Hours 💰 Salary: 35,000 – 100,000 PKR 🧾 Positions Available: 3 About the Role: Unity Films is looking for passionate and research-driven Boxing Script Writers to join our creative team. If you love boxing, storytelling, and YouTube content, this is your chance to turn your passion into a profession. As a Research-Based Script Writer, you will craft engaging and factual scripts centered around boxing matches, fighter rivalries, and career journeys. Your words will bring the energy, drama, and excitement of the ring to life for millions of viewers. Key Responsibilities: Research upcoming and historic boxing fights, rivalries, and fighter backgrounds. Watch and analyze YouTube videos, documentaries, and interviews for accurate insights. Blend storytelling, factual analysis, and emotional depth to engage audiences. Collaborate with editors and voiceover artists to maintain the right tone and flow. Requirements: Strong research and writing skills (English). Passion for boxing and understanding of the sport’s culture. Ability to write engaging, YouTube-style scripts. Prior experience in sports or YouTube scriptwriting is a plus. Reliable, self-motivated, and deadline-oriented. Why Join Us: 💻 Work from the comfort of your home. ⏰ Flexible working hours. 💰 Competitive salary based on skill and performance. 🚀 Opportunity to grow within a fast-growing digital media team. 📩 Apply Now: Send your CV and any sample writing or portfolio work to: 📧 jobs@unityfilms.net
📍 Remote📍 Rawalpindi#Boxing Channel Script Writer🧳 Experienced Required🧳 Fresh Required
